LanguageData.UT_Apparel_ProtectorateArmor.label: protectorate armor
LanguageData.UT_Apparel_ProtectorateArmor.description: A suit of light, powered armor used on the core worlds. Layered plasteel-weave plates are effective at stopping attacks, with few vulnerable joint sections. Neuro-memetic assistors allow a human to wear the armor and still move easily.
